name: sbcied
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: sbciedf(s0, c0, c1, w0, w1, w2)
stmt.pretty: sbciedf(s0, c0, c1, w0, w1, w2)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w1), w2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wb(w1, w2))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w2))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

|- wi(w0, wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w1), w2))

|- wi(w0, wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w1), w2))

comment: Conversion of implicit substitution to explicit class substitution, deduction form. (Contributed by NM, 13-Dec-2014.)
